p: Phylogenetic analysis of the two A/H3N2 strains characterised in Apulia (data not shown) revealed that one strain clustered with the genetic subgroup 3C.2a (reference vaccine strain Hong Kong/4801/2014) and the other within subclade 3C.2a1 (reference strain A/Singapore/INFMH160019/2016, which is the vaccine strain for the 2018-2019 season in the northern hemisphere).
